title: Archive completed bug analyses
description:
Move bug analysis documents for completed fixes to archive. These are linked to done issues and should be archived immediately per policy.

## Acceptance Criteria

- Create  directory
- Move completed bug analysis docs:
  - gate-enforcement-bug-analysis.md (linked to done issue)
  - gate-preview-analysis.md (linked to done issue)
  - state-transition-feedback-design.md (linked to done issue)
- Verify jit doc references still work after move
- Document references preserved in issue metadata

## Notes

These docs are linked to completed issues. The  command should still work after moving the files, as it uses the path stored in issue metadata.

## Success Metrics

- 3 bug analysis docs moved to archive
- jit doc commands still functional
- Links preserved in issue metadata
